properties.entry: update sc_warehouse set Design_text = '{@#text#}' where id='{@#warehouseId#}'
INSERT INTO sc_warehouse ( CODE, NAME, ADDRESS, ZIPCODE, MEMO, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( '{@#code#}', '{@#name#}', '{@#address#}', '{@#zipcode#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW() )
UPDATE sc_warehouse SET CODE = '{@#code#}' , NAME = '{@#name#}' , ADDRESS = '{@#address#}' , ZIPCODE = '{@#zipcode#}' , MEMO = '{@#memo#}' WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'
select sc_warehouse_manage.*, sc_user.NAME, sc_user.PHONE, sc_user.EMAIL from sc_warehouse_manage ,sc_user where 1=1 and sc_user.id = sc_warehouse_manage.user_id and warehouse_id = '{@#warehouseId#}'
select * from sc_warehouse_unit where type = 1 and warehouse_id = '{@#warehouseId#}'
INSERT INTO sc_warehouse_unit ( TYPE, CODE, MEMO, ROW_VALUE, FLOOR_VALUE, COLUMN_VALUE, WAREHOUSE_ID ) VALUES ( '1', '{@#code#}', '{@#memo#}', {@#row#}, {@#floor#}, {@#column#}, '{@#warehouseId#}' )

UPDATE sc_warehouse_unit SET CODE = '{@#code#}' , MEMO = '{@#memo#}' , ROW_VALUE = '{@#row#}' , FLOOR_VALUE = '{@#floor#}' , COLUMN_VALUE = '{@#column#}'
WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'
